activities:
Recruiters and Associates involved in the recruiting process enter Client and Candidate data into a database securely hosted in the Amazon Cloud. The data could be “Name, Company Address, Company Email, Phone, Work Experience, Assessment Data, Compensation Data, Education, and Resume. The Candidate can access their Contact Information and Job preferences to edit or delete. All of our Contacts can request to have ALL records deleted from our system. 

None of the data in our system is publicly available. Users of our software need to securely log in with unique credentials (user ID and passwords) before accessing any of the data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Personal and processed data includes manually processed data.
